unnormalised: **Auto Buzz: New Wheels Hitting the Streets!**
normalised: auto buzz new wheels hitting the streets

unnormalised: Folks, the automotive scene is hotter than a Chennai summer right now! Several big launches just happened.
normalised: folks, the automotive scene is hotter than a Chennai summer right now! several big launches just happened.

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra unveiled their new compact SUV, the "Sherni," at their Chakan plant. Dr. Patil, Head of R&D, promised a mileage of 25 km/l – let's see if it delivers!
normalised: first up, Mahindra unveiled their new compact S U V, the "Sherni," at their Chakan plant. Doctor Patil, Head of R and D, promised a mileage of twenty five kilometer per liter let's see if it delivers!

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors launched a refreshed version of the "Indica" EV, now boasting a bigger battery and a claimed range of 400 km. Prices start at Rs. 12 Lakhs. They even showcased it at IIT Delhi, targeting young techies.
normalised: then, Tata Motors launched a refreshed version of the "Indica" E V, now boasting a bigger battery and a claimed range of four hundred kilometer. prices start at rupee twelve lakhs. they even showcased it at I I T Delhi, targeting young techies.

unnormalised: Maruti Suzuki also joined the fray with a new "Breeza" variant, adding sunroof and a touchscreen bigger than your Nana’s TV! Expect it to eat up some market share.
normalised: Maruti Suzuki also joined the fray with a new "Breeza" variant, adding sunroof and a touchscreen bigger than your Nana's T V! expect it to eat up some market share.

unnormalised: Meanwhile, a startup from Bangalore, "Vayu Motors," is teasing their electric scooter with integrated AI, promising swanky parking assist. They claim their factory occupies 50,000 sq ft of area. All these vehicles are getting ready for the festive season. So much to choose from during Diwali, eh?
normalised: meanwhile, a startup from Bangalore, "Vayu Motors," is teasing their electric scooter with integrated A I, promising swanky parking assist. they claim their factory occupies fifty thousand square feet of area. all these vehicles are getting ready for the festive season. so much to choose from during Diwali, eh?
